#summary Retrieves some annotation using a Distributed Annotation Server.

Retrieves some annotation using a Distributed Annotation Server (DAS[http://www.biodas.org]).

= Parameters =


  * *DAS URI* : DAS DNA URL for Features. Example for UCSC hg19:
        
{{{
http://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/das/hg19/features?segment=__POSITION__;type=knownGene
}}}

The word  *__POSITION__*  will be replaced by the coordinate in the row

=Parameters=
        
  * *CHROM* : VCF CHROM
  * *POS* : VCF Position
  * *Max hit* : Maximum number of DAS record per row.

= Input =


  * *Input* : Input


= Output =


  * *Output* : Output
